abstract: Strait of Hormuz has been subject of controversy many times since 1979 Iranian revolution, but latest incident in which United States Navy responded to Iran's seizing of cargo ship is significant because it threatens multilateral talks over country's nuclear program.
lead_paragraph: After Iran seized a cargo ship in the Strait of Hormuz this week, the United States Navy has accompanied American-flagged vessels to protect against harassment.

headline.main: Strait of Hormuz Once Again at Center of U.S.-Iran Strife
headline.print_headline: Strait of Hormuz Again Becomes a Focus of U.S.
